title: Creating an Equation
text: Complementary angles add to 90, so we have $$x+y=90$$. We also know that $$x-4y=10$$ from the problem.

title: Elimination
text: Let us multiply the first equation by -1 to get $$-x-y=-90$$. We can now add to eliminate x. $$-5y=-80$$

title: Solving for X, Y
text: $$y=\frac{negneg}\left(80\right)}{\operatorname{\left(-5\right)}=16$$. Plugging y back into an original equationi, we get $$90-16=x=74$$.
